meanings.sent1: During the dance competition, Sarah outdanced all her competitors with her graceful moves.
meanings.sent2: She outdanced her partner at the ballroom dance class.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outdanced her older brother at the family party, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for dancing outdanced any obstacles that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The way she outdanced her fears on the dance floor was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To have danced better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: Last night, Tom outdanced his friends at the club and won the dance-off.
meanings.sent2: She outdanced her rival in the final round of the dance competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat outdanced the dog in a playful dance-off in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her joy outdanced her fatigue as she danced through the night.
meanings.sent5: The way she outdanced her doubts on the dance floor was truly remarkable.
